title: GraphicsJS
description:
GraphicsJS is a free open-source JavaScript library for easily drawing any HTML5 graphics & animation from scratch. It is lightweight and more powerful in terms of out-of-the-box features than the existing SVG/VML based components on the market, including the former leaders, Raphaël & Bonsai.

* Powerful line drawing
* Virtual DOM
* Smart layering system
* Rich text features
* Own transformation engine
* Support for legacy browsers
* Convenient JS API with chaining
* Accessibility (Section 508)
